text:
Millions of people in India gathered for the #Kumbh Mela. The #Indiangovernment has allowed these festivities in the midst of a deadly second wave of #covid19.

#Kumbh #KumbhMela #Haridwar #Vaccine #Vaccination #India #World #Pandemic #Covid  #coronavirus  #CovidDeaths https://t.co/mBZ923Yrpi
